message:
On FGS, we are looking to contact big studios to help them with our manpower on the creation of new games.

Also, we would like to contact publishers to distribute our custom made Social Games, like Broken Phone on Facebook and to help us develop new highly profitable Social and Casual games.
We hope you like our company profile and if there is a match, it will be a pleasure to arrange a meeting during FGS, GDC or the week after. martinsv@feelingvertigo.com - www.feelingvertigo.com
